## üìù Description
Here you find the guidelines on how to submit a Pull Request to the `runia_core` repository.
Please make sure to follow these guidelines to ensure a smooth review process.

## ‚öñÔ∏è Legal (Required)
By submitting this Pull Request, I confirm that my contribution is made under the terms of the
**EPL v2.0 License** and the project's **Contributor License Agreement (CLA)**.

- [ ] I have read the [CLA.md](https://github.com/CEA-LIST/runia_core/blob/main/CLA.md).
- [ ] I have added my GitHub username to
[CONTRIBUTORS.yaml](https://github.com/CEA-LIST/runia_core/blob/main/CONTRIBUTORS.yaml).
- [ ] I represent that this contribution is my own original work.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
